Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Compressor stall during acceleration. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 19/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
